post.description:
The `POST` request to `/api/register` is used to register a user. The request should include a form-data body with a parameter `name` of type text.

### Response

The response of the request is in the `text/html` format and contains HTML content. To document the response as a JSON schema, the response should be parsed and converted into a JSON schema manually, as the response itself is not in JSON format.
